definition: Philadelphia, Pennsylvania/abbr. for 費拉德爾菲亞|费拉德尔菲亚[Fei4 la1 de2 er3 fei1 ya4]

sentences.english: Welcome to the Evangelical Formosan Church of Philadelphia resource link repository.
sentences.chinese: 歡迎來到費城臺服基督教會網路資源鏈接庫。

sentences.english: The result: Philly had one of the highest death rates in the country.
sentences.chinese: 結果卻導致費城的死亡率高居全美前列。

sentences.english: Soon after, she began singing the national anthem regularly for Philadelphia's professional sports teams.
sentences.chinese: 稍後，她就開始經常爲費城專業運動隊演唱國歌。

sentences.english: The voyage lasted 46 minutes, from its departure in Philadephia to its landing across the Delaware River.
sentences.chinese: 從費城出發抵達特拉華河對面的旅程持續了46分鐘。

sentences.english: Similar proposals have failed in New York and Philadelphia .
sentences.chinese: 類似的提案在紐約和費城遭到否決。

sentences.english: But the children were the same as the second-graders he'd left behind in Philadelphia.
sentences.chinese: 但是孩子們和他離開的費城二年級的孩子們一樣。

sentences.english: Here is a recording from "The Philadelphia Story."
sentences.chinese: 這裏是從錄製的“費城故事”。

sentences.english: Robey left New York without having made a sale, and stopped in Philadelphia on the way home.
sentences.chinese: 羅比沒有賣出郵票離開紐約，回家的路上他停腳費城。

sentences.english: When he was alive, this person live in 18th-century Philadelphia.
sentences.chinese: 當這個人還活着的時候，他居住於18世紀的費城。

sentences.english: The parade features marchers in elaborate and expensive costumes.
sentences.chinese: 今日費城的化裝遊行依然保留着昔日的部分特色。

sentences.english: In 1777, British troops occupied Philadelphia during the American Revolution.
sentences.chinese: 1777年，在美國革命戰爭中英軍佔領費城。

sentences.english: And Philadelphia is only 11 miles north of Swarthmore.
sentences.chinese: 費城在斯沃斯莫爾北邊只有11英里。

sentences.english: Soon after, the capital was relocated to Philadelphia and then Washington D.C.
sentences.chinese: 不久之後，首都遷至費城，最後定都於華盛頓特區。

sentences.english: One of my roommates is named Gabe and he is from Philadelphia.
sentences.chinese: 我的一個室友叫加布，來自費城。

sentences.english: Philadelphia has been the lucky host for a series of mini-riots.
sentences.chinese: 費城有幸成爲一系列“迷你暴動”的舉辦地。

sentences.english: Today, Ms. Shreeves, of suburban Philadelphia, is the mother of two boys.
sentences.chinese: 現在史瑞夫住在費城的郊區，是兩個男孩的媽媽。

definition: Washington (name)/George Washington (1732-1799), first US president/Washington, US State/Washington, D.C. (US federal capital)
Brooklyn, borough of New York City
